languages.text: {n}Сервиторы Номос поворачивают к вам голову и синхронно кивают, словно в благодарность.{/n}
{n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервиторы Номос поворачивают к вам голову и синхронно кивают, словно в благодарность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ノモスのサーヴィターはあなたの方へ向いて、感謝の念を表しているかのように一斉に頷いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ノモスのサーヴィターはあなたの方へ向いて、感謝の念を表しているかのように一斉に頷いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}诺莫斯的机仆们转过头来，同时点了点头，看起来像是在表达感激之情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}诺莫斯的奴工们转过头来，同时点了点头，看起来像是在表达感激之情。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Nomos' Servitoren drehen ihre Köpfe zu dir und nicken alle gleichzeitig, was wohl eine Geste der Dankbarkeit darstellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos' Servitoren drehen ihre Köpfe zu dir und nicken alle gleichzeitig, was wohl eine Geste der Dankbarkeit darstellt.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Les servitors de Nomos vous regardent et hochent la tête simultanément, ce qui semble être une manifestation de gratitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servitors de Nomos vous regardent et hochent la tête simultanément, ce qui semble être une manifestation de gratitude.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Los servidores de Nomos vuelven la cabeza hacia ti y asienten todos a una en lo que cabría interpretarse como una expresión de gratitud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los servidores de Nomos vuelven la cabeza hacia ti y asienten todos a una en lo que cabría interpretarse como una expresión de gratitud.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Nomos'un hizmetörleri, kafalarını sana doğru çevirip eş zamanlı olarak hafifçe sallıyorlar. Bu hareket, minnettarlık göstergesi olarak yorumlanabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's servitors turn their heads to you and nod all at once in what can be interpreted as an expression of gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos'un hizmetörleri kafalarını sana doğru çeviriyor, eş zamanlı olarak hafifçe sallıyorlar. Bu jest, minnettarlığının bir göstergesi olarak yorumlanabilir.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1
